text: JJ Project is a duo created under 2012, originally meant to be a pre-debut project for GOT7. Their debut single, "Bounce," charted #14 on the US Charts. Despite officially merging with GOT7 in 2014, the group reunited in 2017 due to popular demand from fans. ==Discography== ===Mini-albums=== * Tomorrow, Today (2017) ===Single albums=== * Bounce (2012) Category:1994 births Category:2012 establishments in South Korea Category:K-pop music groups Category:Musical duos Category:Musical groups established in 2012 Category:South Korean boy bands
title: JJ Project
